cards.name: Chastise
cards.effect: Silence 3 [silence] target uncontrolled opponent.
cards.flavor:
It is not their place to stand against Her.
Teach them this,@todo

cards.name: Clean thy Blade
cards.effect:
Draw a card for each attack card you’ve resolved this turn.
Become chivalrous.
cards.flavor: A clean blade is a keen blade.

cards.name: Daring Strike
cards.effect:
Deal 4 damage to target enemy.
Stun them.
cards.flavor:
Knights have been called unwise.
Stupid. But never coward.

cards.name: Enchanted Lake
cards.effect:
Attach to target tile.
At the start of your turn, you may make a tile near Enchanted Lake enchanted terrain.
cards.flavor: Such beauty is found only in Calbria.

cards.name: Enchanted Strike
cards.effect:
Deal 5 damage to target enemy.
Make a tile near you enchanted terrain.
cards.flavor: Where prowess and splendor meet, there is the knight.

cards.name: For the King
cards.effect:
Deal 5 damage to target enemy.
Slow 3 [slow] them.
cards.flavor: "For King Roderic Mayfel!"

cards.name: Have at Thee
cards.effect:
Deal 7 damage to target enemy.
Become chivalrous.
cards.flavor: She fought with honor. That, and countless hours of training

cards.name: Have Faith
cards.effect:
Attach to yourself until your next turn.
If you would take damage, instead prevent that damage and put that many cards from the top of your deck into your discard pile.

cards.name: Holy Ground
cards.effect:
Make two target tile enchanted terrain.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: There are holy sites in Calbria where it is said that no lies may be told.

cards.name: Humble
cards.effect:
Choose one:
- Destroy target card.
- Each player discards down to four cards.

cards.name: Judgement
cards.effect:
Attach to target opponent.
After they dishonor the code of chivalry, deal 2 damage to them.
cards.flavor: The Lady watches diligently through the eyes of her chosen.

cards.name: Justice
cards.effect:
Deal 10 damage to target enemy.
Slow 2 [slow] and Silence 2 [silence] them.
cards.flavor:
Let light was from your blade
and cut away the night.

attributes.name: effect
attributes.value:
Gain a random relic.
If you’ve already gained arelic this game, instead deal 5 damage to each opponent.

attributes.name: flavor
attributes.value:
The darkest hour comes
just before the dawn

cards.name: Oathstone
cards.effect:
Attach to target empty tile.
Opponents near Oathstone can’t expend or pay [initiative].
cards.flavor: Even the wicked are compelled to work no treachery in its shadow.

cards.name: Proclaim
cards.effect: Become chivalrous.
cards.flavor:
A vow is more than a promise.
It is a way of life.

cards.name: Providence
cards.effect:
Heal yourself 4 HP.
After Providence is sent to the discard, draw a card.
cards.flavor: The greatest heroes are forged by darkest rituals.

cards.name: Rebuke
cards.effect:
Counter target card unless its controller pays 3 resources.
If the card is countered disarm 3 them.
cards.flavor: The guilty are not always repentant.

cards.name: Reliquary
cards.effect:
You must be chivalrous to play Reliquary.
Gain a random relic.
cards.flavor:
Take your prize.
It may be just what you need.

cards.name: Stand Aside
cards.effect:
Deal 6 damage to target enemy.
You may travel them one tile.
cards.flavor: The crossroads of Calbria abound with ruffians keen on prey.

cards.name: Throw the Gauntlet
cards.effect: Travel another target character one tile towards you, then travel one tile towards them.
cards.flavor:
Battle approaches.
Make your name known.

cards.name: Attrition
cards.effect:
Choose one:
- Destroy target card.
- Slow 1 [slow] target opponent.
cards.flavor: The Crystal Peaks are landmarks for all the Skels, a reminder of Witer’s grasp.

cards.name: Attrition
cards.effect:
Choose one:
- Destroy target card.
- Slow 1 [slow] target opponent.
cards.flavor: The Crystal Peaks are landmarks for all the Skels, a reminder of Winter’s grasp.

cards.name: Avalanche
cards.effect:
Make each tile in target lane difficult terrain, then deal 10 damage to each character in those tiles.
Travel characters damaged this way to an end tile of the lane.

cards.name: Avalanche
cards.effect:
Deal 10 damage target enemy and Slow 2 [slow] them.
Advantage - deal 6 damage to and Disarm 2 [disarm] them.
cards.flavor: Winter has come.

cards.name: Cold Snap
cards.effect: Deal 3 damage to target controlled opponent.
cards.flavor: Your fingers pop and ice cracks. The cold rushes in to finish the job.

cards.name: Cold Snap
cards.effect:
Deal 2 damage to target enemy.
Advantage - deal 1 damage to them
cards.flavor: Death by the hand of WInter has eternal consequences.

cards.name: Coldshape
cards.effect: Target player gains [mitigate] [mitigate].
cards.flavor: Your hands have woven countless tapestries of fractal beauty.

cards.name: Coldshape
cards.effect: Target player gains Mitigate 2.
cards.flavor: Despite the taboo, few clans survive the Winter without a cryomancer.

cards.name: Cryostasis
cards.effect: Gain [mitigate] [mitigate] [mitigate] [mitigate] [mitigate].
cards.flavor: With your many moons, it is as if the Winter knows what you wish before even you.

cards.name: Cryostasis
cards.effect:
Heroic.
Gain Mitigate 5.
cards.flavor: "As long as the glaciers stand, so will I.”

cards.name: Crystal Blade
cards.effect:
Attach to yourself.
After you successfully attack a nearby enemy for the first time during your turn, deal 2 damage to and Slow 1 [slow] that enemy.

cards.name: Crystal Blade
cards.effect:
Attach to yorself.
The base range [range] of your attack cards is 1.
When you resolve your first attack card targeting an enemy during your turn, deal 2 damage to and Slow 1 [slow] that player.

cards.name: Icebolt
cards.effect:
Deal 3 damage to target enemy.
Advantage - deal 2 more damage to them.
cards.flavor: The Winter is malleable, but only to those who believe it can be.

cards.name: Icebolt
cards.effect:
Deal 3 damage to target enemy.
Advantage - deal 2 damage to them.
cards.flavor: The Winter is malleable, but only to those who believe it can be.

cards.name: Permafrost
cards.effect:
Make target empty tile Difficult Terrain [difficult-terrain], then attach Permafrost to that tile.
At the end of your turn, Slow 2 [slow] each opponent near Permafrost.

cards.name: Everfrost
cards.effect:
Attach to target enemy.
At the end of your turn, Slow 1 [slow] them.
cards.flavor: Winter magic feeds the Winter. With each cast, its domain spreads further.

cards.name: Rime Shock
cards.effect:
Deal 6 damage to target enemy.
Advantage - Slow 2 [slow] them.
cards.flavor: Cold gathers near your palm. It waits patiently to be unleashed.

cards.name: Rime Shock
cards.effect:
Deal 6 damage to target enemy.
Advantage - Slow 2 [slow] them.
cards.flavor: "Careful who you use our magic around. Not all folks will understand."

cards.name: Shatter
cards.effect:
Deal 8 damage to target controlled opponent.
Remove all control affecting them and stun them for each control token removed this way.

cards.name: Shatter
cards.effect:
Deal 8 damage to target enemy.
Advantage - deal 5 damage and remove all Control affecting them.

cards.name: Sleet Blast
cards.effect:
Deal 4 damage to target enemy.
Disarm 1 [disarm] them.

cards.name: Sleet Blast
cards.effect:
Deal 4 damage to target enemy.
Disarm 1 [disarm] them.
cards.flavor: Some of them are bound to break. All of them are bound to hurt.

cards.name: Snow Blast
cards.effect:
Travel another target character up to one tile away from you.
Slow 1 [slow] them.
cards.flavor: You know it isn’t right to kill with the Winter. It’s unnatural. Otherworldly.

cards.name: Snow Blast
cards.effect:
Travel another target player up to one tile away from you.
Slow 1 [slow] them.
cards.flavor: The most important virtue in a cryomancer is patience.

cards.name: Snowslide
cards.effect:
Make target tile difficult terrain.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: To command snow to flow like water is the first test to become a cryomancer.

cards.name: Snowslide
cards.effect:
Make target tile difficult terrain.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Destructive weather is frequently blamed on the local cryomancer.

cards.name: Thin Ice
cards.effect: Counter target card controlled by a player near terrain unless they pay 2 resources.
cards.flavor: A single misstep can end a life.

cards.name: Thin Ice
cards.effect: Counter target card controlled by a player in Terrain unless they pay 2 Resources.
cards.flavor: A single misstep can end a life.

cards.name: Wintertide
cards.effect:
Choose one:
- return target attached caard to its owner’s hand.
- make target tile difficult terrain.

cards.name: Wintertide
cards.effect:
Choose one:
- Return target card from the field to its owner’s hand.
- Make target tile Difficult Terrain [difficult-terrain].
cards.flavor: Since the Winterburst, Winter magic has grown more and more potent.

cards.name: Flash Freeze
cards.effect:
Stun target opponent.
Slow 1 [slow] and Disarm 1 [disarm] them.
cards.flavor: No amount of furs will prepare them for absolute zero.

cards.name: Flash Freeze
cards.effect:
Stun target enemy.
Slow 1 [slow] and Disarm 1 [disarm] them.
cards.flavor: Practitioners of ryomancy draw the ire of the Huntsmen, regardless of their intentions.

cards.name: Fractal Burst
cards.effect:
Draw a card.
Attach to yourself.
Duration - gain [power].
cards.flavor: One must find comfort somewhere while living in these desolate isles.

cards.name: Fractal Burst
cards.effect:
Draw a card.
Attach to yourself.
Duration 3 - gain 1 [power].

cards.name: Frostsnatch
cards.effect:
Counter target card unless its controller spends 3 Resources.
If that card is countered, Slow 2 [slow] the card’s controller.

cards.name: Frostsnatch
cards.effect:
Counter target card unless its controller spends 3 resources.
If that card is countered, Slow 2 [slow] that card’s controller.

cards.name: Glacialize
cards.effect:
Deal 4 damage to target enemy.
Silence 1 [silence] them.
cards.flavor: Your skills with the Winter inspires fear across all the clans.

cards.name: Glacialize
cards.effect:
Deal 4 damage to target enemy.
Silence 1 [silence] them.
cards.flavor: Commonfolk use the phrase ‘a glacial pace’ to describe the deceptively quick.

cards.name: Hailstorm
cards.effect:
Deal 7 damage to target enemy.
Advantage - make two tiles near them difficult terrain.
cards.flavor: Cryomancers will sometimes loose a storm away from the village to protect it.

cards.name: Hailstorm
cards.effect:
Deal 5 damage to target enemy and make target tile difficult terrain.
Advantage - deal 3 damage to them and make the tile they are in difficult terrain.

cards.name: Brambleroots
cards.effect: Slow 3 [slow] target opponent in Terrain.
cards.flavor: The forest knows who its enemies are.

cards.name: Druidic Lore
cards.effect: Seek
cards.flavor: Times long ago reveal the path to a better future.

cards.name: Druidic Strike
cards.effect:
Deal 4 damage to target enemy.
Seek.
cards.flavor: Violence brings the clearest visions.

cards.name: Emerald Seed
cards.effect:
Attach to target empty tile near terrain.
At the end of your turn, if you’re near Emerald Seed, heal yourself 1 HP.
cards.flavor: It gives you hope that the isles will go on.

cards.name: Grove
cards.effect:
Attach to target empty tile.
At the end of your turn, if you’re near Grove, you may attach a card from your discard to yourself.
cards.flavor: Where the old ways are strongest.

cards.name: Memory of Yore
cards.effect: Return a card that generates [power] from your discard to the top of your deck.
cards.flavor: The kiss of the wind, warm and kind. The rush of the river, sure and steady.

cards.name: Replenish
cards.effect:
Attach to target player.
Duration - heal them 2 HP.
cards.flavor: The woods themselves whisper their thanks on tje wind.

cards.name: Reseed
cards.effect: Make two target tiles difficult terrain.
cards.flavor: Nature will reclaim these lands. You will ensure it.

cards.name: Restoration
cards.effect:
Choose one:
- Destroy target card.
- Return an Ability card from your discard to your hand.

cards.name: Return To Myth
cards.effect:
Counter target card unless its controller spends 3 resources.
Seek

cards.name: Revitalize
cards.effect:
Attach to target player.
Duration - heal them 3 HP.
cards.flavor: As the lands heal, so do you.

cards.name: Slash of Yore
cards.effect:
Deal 5 damage to target enemy.
You may return an attack card with a resource cost of 1 or less from your discard to your hand.
cards.flavor: Time is a web to be scattered.

cards.name: Thicket
cards.effect:
Make target empty tile and another tile near it difficult terrain, then attach Thicket to the target tile.
After an opponent enters Thicket, stun them.

cards.name: Thornpath
cards.effect:
Choose one:
- Travel up to two tiles.
- Deal 6 damage to target enemy.
cards.flavor: You’ve not travelled this far to fall before such a foe.

cards.name: Thrive
cards.effect:
Attach to yourself.
At the end of your turn, make target tile difficult terrain.
cards.flavor: Throughout the isles, the druids bring life back from the brink of the Winter’s jaws.

cards.name: Verdant Slash
cards.effect:
Deal 6 damage to target enemy.
Attach to yourself.
Duration - heal yourself 2 HP.
cards.flavor: Their bones honor the isles by seeding new growth.

cards.name: Verdant Strike
cards.effect:
Deal 4 damage to target enemy.
Attach to yourself.
Duration - heal yourself 1 HP.
cards.flavor: From their blood will spring flowers and summer will return once more.

cards.name: Vine Snap
cards.effect:
Attach to target empty tile.
After an enemy enters Vine Snap, destroy Vine Snap and deal 5 damage to them.
At the start of your turn, if no player is on Vine Snap, each opponent travels to Vine Snap unless they pay 1 resource.

cards.name: Wispform
cards.effect: Travel to target tile.
cards.flavor: Few even believe wisps still exist. Even fewer know they do.

cards.name: Wonder
cards.effect: Silence 2 [silence] target opponent.
cards.flavor: There is tranquility here that all should strive for. They see that now.
